code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{TextField,Button,Container}from'@material-ui/core';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ConsultationForm(_ref){let{onAddConsultation}=_ref;const[studentName,setStudentName]=useState('');const[course,setCourse]=useState('');const[consultationDate,setConsultationDate]=useState('');const[details,setDetails]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onAddConsultation({studentName,course,consultationDate,details});setStudentName('');setCourse('');setConsultationDate('');setDetails('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Student Name",value:studentName,onChange:e=>setStudentName(e.target.value),fullWidth:true,style:{marginBottom:'20px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Course",value:course,onChange:e=>setCourse(e.target.value),fullWidth:true,style:{marginBottom:'20px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{type:"datetime-local",value:consultationDate,onChange:e=>setConsultationDate(e.target.value),fullWidth:true,style:{marginBottom:'20px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Details",value:details,onChange:e=>setDetails(e.target.value),fullWidth:true,style:{marginBottom:'20px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"submit",variant:"contained",color:"primary",children:"Add Consultation"})]})});}export default ConsultationForm;
